ResistanceFeature.Name: Boots of the Winterlands
ResistanceFeature.Text: These furred boots are snug and feel quite warm. While you wear them, you gain the following benefits: • You have resistance to cold damage. • You ignore difficult terrain created by ice or snow. • You can tolerate temperatures as low as -50 degrees Fahrenheit without any additional protection. If you wear heavy clothes, you can tolerate temperatures as low as -100 degrees Fahrenheit
